ReplicationSubnetGroupDescription.description: The description for the subnet group.

ReplicationSubnetGroupIdentifier.description: The name for the replication subnet group. This value is stored as a lowercase string. Constraints: Must contain no more than 255 alphanumeric characters, periods, spaces, underscores, or hyphens. Must not be 'default'. Example: mySubnetgroup

SubnetIds.description: The EC2 subnet IDs for the subnet group.

Tags.description: The tag to be assigned to the subnet group.
